title: Elementalist lux glitch
body: I somehow managed to change from Nature to Water. I somehow managed to do this by changing to nature from nature(I have no idea how i did that) and then this happened.

replies.body:
Hey Goldenfury12 - 

Thanks for the report! You'll see a fix for this in 7.13!

Yeah I just managed to do the same thing but with fire. I started fire then it let me select it again and I was curious, so I clicked it. Then it bugged for a second and stuck me into nature. The icon still read like "You have mastered the elements now select your final form" but I couldn't change it.
